Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Andra L
Reviews.Content: I stay here everytime when I come to Istanbul with my familiy for business and I feel very good. Is clean, comfortable and close to the Grand Bazar. I stay in December 2011, March 2012 and I will go in May-June also.

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: IoanaMititelu
Reviews.Content: I stay here for 1 night but was very good. I give a 10 for this hotel. Ioana Mititelu,Romania

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Cjl01
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in an excellent location, rooms were small but very clean and comfortable. Silence was golden after coming in from the crazy city. Didn't hear a sound from other people or outside. Only problem was a top disappeared from my case on the last day. I spoke to the hotel and emailed once I got home to see if it had been found or handed in but so far I have had no reply. We asked reception to book a table for us but the restuarant we chose was closed so he sent us to his friends restuarant under the bridge. Wouldn't recommend it to any body else. Basic menu, boyfriends food was wrong but the waiter just shrugged his shoulders and wondered off.

Reviews.Title: “Very bad hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tibidox
Reviews.Content: New hotel, clean comfortable room (4* level). But it's terrible if you were accomodated on the floor 1, behind the reception. Staff were listening to the music all night, no care about us. It's too loud in the morning also, no you don't understand, TOO LOUD. Staff is non-qualified, there is no room-service at all. Also, this hotel made us to pay for our stay 1 day before leaving. Not recommended at all. No stars in european & american sense.

Reviews.Title: “absolutely we ll come back”
Reviews.Author: symetry
Reviews.Content: that was a family trip and we stayed at this hotel. it was a great experience for us. the hotel was newly renovated, very comfortable and clean. the hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. the breakfast has huge selection. it is very close to grand bazaar and hagia sophia. no doubt, we ll absolutely come back here..

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST IN THE ENTIRE WORLD!”
Reviews.Author: serraarara
Reviews.Content: great service,awesome staff,super clean and tidy,on the dot service.simply stunning and elegant.most certainly classy.Upon my arrival they were so sweet and caring.Close to all the fun,definitely one of the smartest hotels to stay during your visit.pricing is not too shabby.the food was delicious.the hotel and the aura it provides you is illuminating.simply magnificent.no other words can describe my stay at Emporium.beauty and elegance at it's finest.

HotelInfo.Name: Emporium Hotel Istanbul
HotelInfo.Address: Ordu Street no:23, Istanbul 34130, Turkey
